meanings.definition: A small cluster or mass of blood vessels or nerve endings.
meanings.sent1: The glomerule of blood vessels in the brain helps regulate blood flow.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a glomerule of nerve endings at the tip of her finger.
meanings.sent3: The glomerule of blood vessels threw a party, inviting all the nerve endings to join.
meanings.sent4: The glomerule of nerve endings was a tangled web of connections, like a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The glomerule of blood vessels pulsed with life, like a tiny beating heart.

meanings.definition: A small roundish body or mass.
meanings.sent1: The pond was filled with lily pads, each one a glomerule of green leaves.
meanings.sent2: She found a glomerule of pebbles at the bottom of the stream.
meanings.sent3: The glomerule of candies in the jar looked like a colorful treasure trove.
meanings.sent4: The glomerule of clouds in the sky drifted lazily, changing shapes with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The glomerule of marbles rolled across the floor, creating a playful sound.
